Svenska

Furnished accommodation for workers in Sweden

We offer practical and furnished accommodation for workers and companies temporarily working in Sweden.

The focus is on functionality, simplicity and a reliable place to stay during the work period.

The accommodation

Our accommodations are designed for everyday living and are suitable for both individuals and work teams.

  • Bed and storage
  • Kitchen with basic equipment
  • Bathroom with shower
  • Internet
  • Laundry facilities

About us

We provide accommodation for workers staying in Sweden for short or longer periods. The goal is to offer a straightforward and reliable housing solution.
